resources.string: A simple game which increases your intuitive maths skills
Swipe Right on the circle and increase the total in the right tile.
Swipe Left on the circle and increase the total in the left tile
One minute timer with bonus time and score for highest score
Keep the difference between the tiles less than or equal to 8
Create high score, play and share with friends
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
